shared.BOT_INTRO: Hi there! I'm a bot that replies to [Path of Building](https://github.com/Openarl/PathOfBuilding) builds with a short summary of the build [like this](https://i.imgur.com/Ee9Sbo1.png)! Just include a link to any Path of Building pastebin or [pob.party](https://pob.party/) link in your comment or submission and I'll automatically respond.
